citations.desc: ACCESS AND INSPECTION OF RECORDS AND PROPERTY; SUBMISSION OF ITINERARIES.
citations.narrative:
A responsible adult was not available to accompany APHIS Officials during the inspection process at 1045 on
07/26/2016. The Inspector was able to make contact with an individual at the premise. At that time, the inspector
was informed that a facility representative was not available for inspection.

narrative:
2.126(b)
ACCESS AND INSPECTION OF RECORDS AND PROPERTY; SUBMISSION OF ITINERARIES.
A responsible adult was not available to accompany APHIS Officials during the inspection process at 1045 on
07/26/2016.  The Inspector was able to make contact with an individual at the premise.  At that time, the inspector
was informed that a facility representative was not available for inspection.
